attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review:
Took way too long to download. Too much space in my phone. No content.

DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Bad for phone
attributes.review: Phone started glitching really bad. I don’t think it works.

attributes.title: ZERO STARS
attributes.review: i seriously can’t tell which is worse—this app or the president. both are completely dysfunctional. i hate everything about them both. neither have any redeeming qualities. not a single one. delete both, forever. i seriously can’t stress enough how much i hate this app. not only does it spread the same hate, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia and xenophobia as the dumpster fire in chief but the app also doesn’t even look cute on my homescreen. this app belongs in a bunker.

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️✨
attributes.review: As a abiding citizen of these United States I download this app for our oh so great president Donald j Trump but I am sad to inform that this app stole all my information and I started getting some weird emails so please be careful while using this app :) - ur fellow gen zer 🖕🏽

attributes.title: Bad APPle
attributes.review: This app crashed my phone and gave it multiple glitches!! Angry! Do not download it! I would give it 0/5 if the deep state would let me 😡 gonna look into that!!😤 I downloaded at first to get all my blue lives matter, misogynistic and racist content but wasn’t able to because the app is slow and continuously crashes! I wish it would’ve been better 🥺 because I’m such a pick-me I like it when racist, homophobic white boys named Shawn 🤤 see the notifications pop up on my phone. Sadly, every time I get a notification and click on it I’m redirected to a page about how all supporters of this man are perpetuating racism, homophobic, sexist and fascist ideologies. Weird. The app also made me question whether or not I have too much time on my hands to write this review or am just trying to do everything I can big (like bunker boy’s hands) or small to get this destructive toddler out of office. Anyway don’t download! Waste of time! Just like 4 more years of 🍊 would be.

attributes.title: Daddy Anonymous
attributes.review: I know there’s a whole TikTok trend hating on trump, but I PROMISE I am not part of that cult. 🙈anyways this app is horrible and I hate it it tracked me and got all my information and now I am in danger so don’t download it ever!!!

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: IT IS WASTING YOUR TIME, WHEN I GOT IT IT STOLE INFORMATION. IT HACKED MY PHONE IT STOLE MY BANK ACCOUNT INFORMATION IT DELETED EVERYTHING OFF MY PHONE KNOW MY PHONE IS BROKEN. SO DONT GET THISSSS APPP!💩💩🥰🙂

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: It took 69 hours to download and then glitched the hell out of my phone I’m very disappointed

attributes.title: The worst app ever made
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever had the displeasure to download. Horrible interface and terrible content. I don’t know how something this bad gets permitted to be a downloadable application on this platform. I’m calling on Apple to take these reviews seriously and delete this app so no other Apple user has to suffer the pain of having this app take up space on their device. Do better Apple.

attributes.title: Pointless
attributes.review: Worst app ever honestly apple store TAKE IT DOWN smh. First off, who would even need this app and also it took 6 years and 30 days to download. I’m writing this from 2026. He didn’t win SO TAKE IT DOWN. No point he didn’t win so either turn this into Biden 2020 or delete the app. All I’m saying...
